PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Because of the strong aggregation behavior , the absorption cut - off of the polymer thin films could extend to ∼ 780 nm , giving rise to a narrow optical band gap of ∼ 1.6 eV.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| strong aggregation behavior |
| absorption cut-off |
| optical band gap |

The three "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are "strong aggregation behavior," "absorption cut-off," and "optical band gap." These entities are mentioned as properties of the polymer thin films.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| absorption cut-off |
| optical band gap |

After reviewing the paragraph, the only clear "Material Property" entities are "absorption cut-off" and "optical band gap." The phrase "strong aggregation behavior" is a behavior or characteristic, but it is not a well-defined material property. Therefore, it has been excluded from the list.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Because of the strong aggregation behavior , the absorption cut - off of the polymer thin films could extend to ∼ 780 nm , giving rise to a narrow optical band gap of ∼ 1.6 eV.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| ∼ 780 nm |
| ∼ 1.6 eV |

In the given paragraph, the "Property Value" entities are "∼ 780 nm" and "∼ 1.6 eV", which represent the extended absorption cut-off of polymer thin films and the resulting narrow optical band gap, respectively.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After reviewing the paragraph, there is only one clear "Value of material property" entity. Here is the table with the valid entity:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| ∼ 780 nm |

The entity "∼ 780 nm" is the only clear value of a material property in the paragraph, representing the extended absorption cut-off of the polymer thin films. The other entity, "∼ 1.6 eV", is not a clear value of a material property, as it is a consequence of the extended absorption cut-off and not a property itself.
